thread.section_title: Viagogo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Viagogo | www.viagogo.ie
thread.title: Greg

author: Greg
title: Greg
text:
Clicked on a Google Ad when looking for 2 tickets to a gig that had just gone on sale (not sold out!). Saw the horrendous booking fees of about €40 per ticket too late. Couldn't cancel the booking. Would have saved €80+ on Ticketmaster. Funny enough, the tickets I was finally sent were purchased via Ticketmaster. My mistake to fall for it, but still misleading and scammy. Never again. If I had burnt €80, at least it would have been warm for a second or two.
PS: If I had sold them for the retail price on viagogo I would have made an even bigger loss... because of fees... again.
